articles.author: Mihai Matei
articles.title: iPhones to finally get charging feature Galaxy phones had for years - SamMobile
articles.description: Smartphone shipments declined 4% in Europe in the first quarter of the year compared to Q1 2024. Several brands, including Samsung, have recorded fewer shipments year-on-year, but shipment market shares have stayed relatively the same. Counterpoint Research r…
articles.content: For the first time in several quarters, a Samsung Ultra phone has rejoined the list of the world's top 10 best-selling smartphones. According to market data shared by Counterpoint Research, the Galax… [+2264 chars]
